name: TauCeti

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

# update and download the required packages
apt-get update
apt-get install git wget -y

# clone the goonstation repo
git clone https://github.com/TauCetiStation/TauCetiClassic.git /mnt/server

cd /mnt/server || exit

if [ -d /mnt/server/.git ]; then
git config --global --add safe.directory /mnt/server
git pull
fi

# create the required file to compile the server
#touch ./+secret/__secret.dme

# download missing library
#wget https://github.com/tgstation/rust-g/releases/latest/download/librust_g.so

# compile the server
DreamMaker taucetistation.dme
